price: আৰু অবিনশ্বৰ কেৱল তোমাৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ চেহেৰা, যিজন মহিমাময়, মহানুভৱ;
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
